short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a right-click menu option to toggle cancer on/off in Twitch's chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right-click on a Twitch chat to toggle cancer on and off. Removes all emoticons and hides cancer messages except from subs.

When switched on, chat messages from regular Twitch users are checked for signs of bad quality posting like repeated words, lots of capital letters, lots of emotes, etc. Bad quality messages have their text turned partly transparent to help you read good quality messages easily and ignore bad ones.

GIF examples:
- curing robotic cancer: https://gyazo.com/bd5a118c2ff7e207e01ef1a43a4b8d7b
- curing chat spam: https://gyazo.com/1baf918ad4eb32762189b09cea6b1e06

For all your chat cancer statistics needs: https://cancerino.info.
